WorkItem.Description:
Hello Team,
 
First of all a big congrats to the team at "All-in-One Code Framework" for such a wonderful project. 
 
Question: How do I consume a XML web service from a remote host. I Understand we can use xhr, but not have much luck in getting it work.
 
What I like to achieve: Call a remote xml page and display the text from xml in a tile.

Comments.Message:
Hello libin85,

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service!   

Your sample request is about how to access Xml Web Service.  If I misunderstood your requirement, please feel free to let me know. 

We found that the following sample can probably answer your request.

http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsapps/XHR-handling-navigation-50d03a7a
The sample demonstrates how to use WinJS.XHR to make a remote XHR call and retrieve the content.

Please let us know if this sample is helpful to you. 

Thanks and have a great day!

--------------------
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework 
Feedback address: onecode@microsoft.com
